# limel-example-icon-size



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

Size
There are preset sizes.
:::note
Setting the `bade` prop to `true` affects how big the icon is rendered,
but only when the `size` attribute is also set.
:::

## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [limel-icon](..)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  limel-example-icon-size --> limel-icon
  style limel-example-icon-size fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
